channel.title: github on Mike's ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in github on Mike's ramblings

item.title: moving to github
item.description: So I’m a big dabbler when it comes to my personal site/pages, over the years I’ve moved from the following technologies/software to host: Simple HTML - 1999 Roxen - 2005 Wordpress Drupal Wordpress (again) Blogger Ghost I’ve had a dabble with Jekyll in the past (specifically Heckle) whilst I was playing with moving things to Ghost and given I have already migrated all of my content into Markdown it sounded like the best option (especially given I don’t have to then host the application somewhere)
